description: Minor issue, but it appears that nova-tarmac is still running tests with nose tests/api.  These are actually picked up by run_tests.sh, so the api tests are running twice.
title: Hudson nova-tarmac runs some tests twice

comments.content: Minor issue, but it appears that nova-tarmac is still running tests with nose tests/api.  These are actually picked up by run_tests.sh, so the api tests are running twice.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content: Fixed. I also removed the pep8 check since we run that from run_tests.sh now, too.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren
